name: Mission Modern Army Attack
description:
Mission Modern Army Attack is 3D FPS game. In the game you play the role of a superb shot technology elite killer. You will be faced with fully armed murderous terrorists,they are heinous, with little attention you will be killed by them. In order to complete the task and not be killed by them, you have to go all out.
Features!
• Second person shooting game.
• Challenging mission.
• Different varieties of weapon.
• Use modern radar to identify enemy location.
• 3D stunning graphic.
• It’s totally free game and easy to play.
